oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fractal dimension of backbone of Eden trees
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANNA, SS
DHAR, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: river networks
surface
growth
model
diffusion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We relate the fractal dimension of the backbone, and the spectral dimension of Eden trees to the dynamical exponent z. In two dimensions, it gives fractal dimension of backbone equal to 4/3 and spectral dimension of trees equal to 5/4. In three dimensions, it provides us with another way to estimate z numerically. We get z=1.617+/-0.004.
